FuncDef:
The description command configures a description for a flexible flow.
The undo description command deletes a description for a flexible flow. The description command configures a description for a flexible flow. The undo description command deletes a description for a flexible flow. By default, no flexible flow description is configured.
ParentView: IPv4 flexible flow statistics template view,IPv6 flexible flow statistics template view,VXLAN flexible flow statistics template view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the description for a flexible flow.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo: Multiple flexible flows can be configured, each of which can be assigned matching and collected fields. To help rapidly understand a flexible flow, run the description command to configure a description for each flow. For example, a description defines some fields or meanings of fields in packets for a flexible flow.
